mapper.sql: id, logisticsno, shippername, shippertel, shipperaddress, packstatus, receivestatus, requestcodes, packno, type, customertel, customername, remark, customerno, ownid, createtime, createby, cuttime, cutstatus
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from logistics_pack
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT *,e.name as ownname,e1.name as creatername FROM logistics_pack lp left join employee e on e.id=lp.ownid left join employee e1 on e1.id=lp.createby where packno=#{packno,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by packno
SELECT * FROM logistics_pack WHERE requestcodes like #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into logistics_pack (id, logisticsno, shippername, shippertel, shipperaddress, packstatus, receivestatus, requestcodes, packno, type, customertel, customername, remark, customerno, ownid, createtime, createby, cuttime, cutstatus) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipperaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packstatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{receivestatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{requestcodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{customertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cuttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cutstatus,jdbcType=CHAR})
